p: Next, we tested eltrombopag in combination with ganciclovir, the mainstay of anti-HCMV therapies [ 13]. The combination of equimolar eltrombopag and ganciclovir concentrations resulted in synergistic anti-HCMV effects ( Figure 4), which is illustrated by a weighted average combination index (CI WT) of 0.17 ± 0.03, as determined by the method of Chou and Talalay [ 24]. According to this method, combined effects are considered to be synergistic at a CI WT of ≤0.7 [ 24]. The combination of eltrombopag and foscarnet also displayed synergistic effects ( Table S2).
